hero.headline: We all take childbirth for granted...

children.text: On March 22, 2020, Annie and Tony checked into the hospital for what should have been a routine delivery of their baby boy. What followed was 24 days that would change their lives forever.
As a case study supporting both AFE and mental-trauma awareness, screening and discussing 24 Days can help foster a culture where trauma-informed care is not just a policy, but a lived practice.
Raw, powerful, and deeply moving. This film doesn't just tell a storyâ€”it invites you to feel every moment and leaves you thinking long after the credits roll.
I'm a better nurse for having the opportunity to see their story. This film should be essential viewing for all healthcare professionals.
This film should be essential viewing for all healthcare professionals who are involved in obstetric care.
